meanings.definition: Vocal or instrumental sounds combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion.
meanings.sent1: The music played by the band was so beautiful and made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to music while I study; it helps me concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The music coming from the kitchen was so loud that the pots and pans started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music to his ears, bringing joy to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The music of the wind rustling through the leaves was a soothing lullaby.
